inkball

Enum ColorCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ColorCode>
      • inkball.ColorCode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ColorCode>

    public enum ColorCode
extends java.lang.Enum<ColorCode>
    Enumeration representing the color codes used in the InkBall game. Provides mappings between color names and their corresponding integer values.
